mapper.select: SELECT code_id AS codeId ,name ,is_used AS isUsed ,codegroup_id AS codegroupId FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND code_id = #{codeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code( name ,created_at ,is_used ,is_deleted ,codegroup_id ) VALUES( #{name}, now(), #{isUsed}, 0, #{codegroupId} )
